website_summaries.verdict: A large, but affordably price hot dog roller that can cook up to 30 hot dogs at one time.
pros: This durable stainless steel unit is suitable for larger scale needs such as sporting events and farmer's markets
It features a dual temperature control and a drip tray that is easy to remove and clean
cons: The company does not sell sneeze guards
If that is important, you will need to consider a different model

customer_reviews.title: Works great; love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this hotdog roller for our church kitchen. Just made my second big batch of hot dogs and I’m very very pleased. It works just as I had anticipated and the hotdogs are delicious. As long as it continues to work the way it does right now, will be very pleased. The hotdogs get golden brown. The temperature seems to regulate very well. Cleanup as as expected on these units, but with a good soft scouring pad And a little mild detergent, and cleans up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Creason

customer_reviews.title: Back set of rollers died within a month
customer_reviews.text: The back rollers stopped working a month after purchasing. Requested warranty replacement, was given directions on how to fix ourselves first and then refund check was issued to purchase another machine. Not sure why they couldn't just send out a new one so we didn't have to go through the hassle of waiting for the check to arrive, cashing and then purchasing a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: EASY- EASY- EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean- cooks hot dogs &/or brats perfectly with variable control. Love this item- the only things I will say, is that if you are using true "Bun Size" hot dogs, you will not fit the maximum amount product is stated to hold. Regular size franks are no issue. Either way cooks the perfect hot dog and keeps them without burning as long as you regulate the temp correctly. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grobelny

customer_reviews.title: HOT DOG!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one of the kids events. The hot dogs cook fast and evenly. I love it! It is so easy to clean and use. You just put the hot dogs on the roller and turn to the desired temperature. They can cook quickly or slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't actually fit 30 hot dogs since three across would keep the rollers from rolling, however, it works fantastic and the taste of the hot dogs is exactly what I was expecting! Doesn't take long either...just prewarm and put the dogs on and within 20 minutes you're ready to eat!
customer_reviews.author: wolfgarfang

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for Grilling Hot Dogs
customer_reviews.text: We use this machine weekly to serve hot dogs at our community bingo event. The roller machine cooks them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancianne

customer_reviews.title: Very Excited
customer_reviews.text: I loved it.. very easy to make alot of hotdogs at one time, very easy to clean too.. just turn it on and wipe the rollers with soapy water.. some scrubbing needed depending on what you make..
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and cost with all the machines ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and cost with all the machines that are out for comparison. It was bought for large group functions st my church . Highly recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We use it for fund raising and cooks a great hotdog perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hot dog maker. It is great. Cooks dogs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cardcadie

customer_reviews.title: Great machine HIGHLY recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our concession stand and it works amazingly. We can fill the roller with 20 hotdogs and 10 sausages. It heats up quickly and at 375 degrees it cooks the hotdogs quickly and to a perfect brown as long as you keep an eye on it to not burn them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Roumillat

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I’m glad I made the purchase. I brought it for my daughters sweet 16 pool party and it was such a hit I now use it every time I make hotdogs at home. You can precook the hotdogs if you would like but it’s really not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gruning

customer_reviews.title: value is worth  the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our family absolutely loves this hotdog roller... It is wonderful and we all use it... Cleaning is a bit tricky... But we have figured out an easy way to clean it... Let the rollers cool but turn and keep scrubbing LOL
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Reed

customer_reviews.title: Might wanna spray coat rollers before use.
customer_reviews.text: After one use rollers r already burnt n nasty. Hotdogs got stuck and didn't always roll so had to constantly keep eye on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The price to rent was only slightly less then to purchase so this just made more sense! Worked great for our summer party
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blakslee

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I used this roller machine in my store for 2 weeks before it quit working. It simply stopped rolling. I contacted the company and was treated rudely and with no resolve. 2 WEEKS it worked. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Hot dogs and sausage dogs are selling out!
customer_reviews.text: This grill makes all of the difference in the taste of hot dogs and sausage dogs. Makes life behind the counter so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Martha M

customer_reviews.title: really like it had more to add
customer_reviews.text: just for you all to know I bought separately Sneeze Guard Cover ONLY for 30 Hot Dog 11 Roller Grilling Machine Superior and it fit this model perfectly so nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the hotdog roller 3 times and it looks terrible. It will not come clean no matter how hard I scrub.
customer_reviews.author: concession crew

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very fair price and the function is very nice. I used it for my company event.
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, we use it for our church functions.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Raup

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Don't have to watch the dogs as they cook or keep turning them.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Don't have to watch the dogs as they cook or keep turning them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Allows you to spend time with guests
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can cook 30 hotdogs, sausages & brats at the same time without having to stand over a grill - great for my Octoberfest party!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Put the dogs on and forget about them. Kinda. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L. Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a football party and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Still working out what temperatures work best for larger items like sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great hotdog rollers
customer_reviews.text: I work very well at the basketball tournaments. It cooked fast and cleaned up easy
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Great maker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit, easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Cary J.

customer_reviews.title: Handy item for parties
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this hot dog roller. It was a big hit at our superbowl party and it was very easy to clean and maintain. I have used it many times and I even have others that want to borrow it for their parties!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! Cooks hot dogs, brats, Italian sausages like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a nice cut just taking the item out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Warning, the metal overlays are not smooth. Say the least, a nice cut just taking the item out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: tpr cord

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product...
customer_reviews.text: Roller only worked about 2 weeks. And I tried reaching out to the company and the sent me a picture of the motor and chain. I had a repair man out that cost 80.00 a hour to tell me the motor wasn't working. And by the time I got all this done the company said the warranty ended . A 1 month warranty on anything is unheard of.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Varesko

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It evenly cooked the hotdogs as well as taquitos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our new grill for lunch at work
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use it to sell at work . And we were happy . Time saving . No stress 😍
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Clevr Commercial Hotdog Roller Machine 11 Roller and 30 Hot Dog Grill Cooker Warmer
feature_bullets: Durable Stainless Steel construction. Dual temperature control (front & back) allows you to cook and/or keep hot dogs warm for higher serving efficiency. CE Approved, ETL Certified.
11 non-Stick and premium grade stainless steel rollers, rotate 360 degrees, can cook up to 30 hot dogs per batch
This hot dog grill is perfect for both commercial uses and household uses, such as convenient stores, liquor stores, long meetings, farmer markets, all sporting events and more
Easy to use and easy to clean
Power: 1400 Watts 110V/60Hz - Overall dimensions:23" L x 19" W x 7.7" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
